content.raw:
this is what i did:

```sh
cd ~; hg clone #!/osrf/gzweb
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y libjansson-dev libboost-dev imagemagick libtinyxml-dev mercurial cmake build-essential wget nodejs npm nodejs-legacy
cd ~/gzweb
npm install -g grunt
npm run deploy
cp -r /usr/share/gazebo-7/models/* ./ 
cd ~/gzweb && ./webify_models_v2.py ./http/client/assets/
```
content.html:
this is what i did:

cd ~; hg clone #!/osrf/gzweb
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y libjansson-dev libboost-dev imagemagick libtinyxml-dev mercurial cmake build-essential wget nodejs npm nodejs-legacy
cd ~/gzweb
npm install -g grunt
npm run deploy
cp -r /usr/share/gazebo-7/models/* ./ 
cd ~/gzweb && ./webify_models_v2.py ./http/client/assets/
